text:
Check https://github.com/PCManticore/astroid/blob/master/astroid/rebuilder.py#L205

For Python 3.5 at least, the values of kwarg and vararg are arg.arg nodes, which have correctly set the line number and the column offset properties, we should use those instead of those of the arguments node, which are empty. For older versions, we can't do anything, since they are strings.

Also modify our tree library.
title: Setting the wrong line number and col_offset for some Params
Setting the wrong line number and col_offset for some Params
